byline.original: By BRIAN STELTER; Compiled by ADAM W. KEPLER

abstract: Fox announces that Keenen Ivory Wayans will host and produce two half-hour sketch specials that will be based on his original 1990s sketch comedy television series In Living Color.
snippet: “In Living Color,” the sketch comedy series that introduced America to the Wayans brothers 20 years ago, is being resurrected for Fox by one of the brothers.
lead_paragraph: “In Living Color,” the sketch comedy series that introduced America to the Wayans brothers 20 years ago, is being resurrected for Fox by one of the brothers.

headline.main: ‘In Living Color’ to Return on Fox
headline.print_headline: ‘In Living Color’ To Return on Fox
